name: Castle Rambler
description:
This is a puzzle game that you move the dice to get the highest score!

Made during GMTK GameJam 2022 !

In Castle Rambler, you play as a Die

W A S D to Move
Q to Switch Cameras
SPACE to Randomize your face directions & to select levels
R to restart level

Each time you touch a brick with a number on it, you drop a Face

A die has only six Faces, so you can only move six times ! ! !

But guess you can somehow get your faces back (^▽^ )

With the Face dropped on the brick, you can whether get or reduce score determined by the Color of the brick and the numbers on the both brick and the Face dropped

So the main goal is to get HIGHEST score with limited moves and reach the finish brick
